duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement the RES Quality Management System and execute Quality Control Processes and Procedures for the Project Site Construction Team.
Develop and maintain the Construction Quality Plan and Inspection Test Plan (ITP) throughout the duration of the assigned project.
Prepare and track the Inspection Test Plan (ITP) with support of Subject Matter Experts (SME) throughout the Project Lifecycle.
Manage the Job Book Table of Contents (TOC) for project specific requirements and report client requested changes to the Project Manager.
Ensure Procore project folders are established and populated with required documentation, results, and data.
Lead and train project personnel to perform Quality Control (QC) inspections and identify potential Quality Issues or Incidents.
Provide routine reports on project quality status and metrics to Project and Corporate Leadership.
Conduct post-scope reviews and collaborate with Project management to identify and record Lessons Learned.
Communicate Quality issues and resolutions to the Project Client when required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor Degree Civil, Electrical or Industrial Engineering Degree (or equivalent 3 years of experience) preferred.
